participant_1.name: Carlos
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and family-oriented, Carlos values deep connections with friends and family and seeks adventure in everyday life.
participant_1.background: I once swam across a river to get back to my car after getting a speeding ticket. I am from Mexico. I enjoy practicing my religion, reading, and spending time with my friends and family. I am Hispanic and my friends are my family. My custom truck is my pride and joy.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Creative and introspective, Emily finds inspiration in her surroundings and enjoys sharing her thoughts through writing.
participant_2.background: My family is supportive of my career choices. I ride my bicycle every day to keep fit and to clear my head so I can focus on my writing. I met the most interesting people while filming my documentary. I think my pets are the best things in my life. I like alternative rock.

content.text: Hey! It's going well! I just finished writing a scene in my novel, and I'm about to go for a bike ride. How are you?
I'm doing alright. I'm just getting back from a long drive. I'm from Mexico, so I drove to the US to visit family.
Oh wow, that's a long drive! How was it?
It was pretty good. I got to see some beautiful scenery, and I got to spend time with my family.
That's great! I'm glad you had a good time.
Thanks! I'm glad you're having a good day too. What are you writing a novel about?
It's about a group of friends who go on a road trip to find themselves.
Oh, that sounds really interesting! I'd love to read it when you're finished.
Thanks! I'll let you know when it's done.
Well, I should probably get going. I have to start biking.
